column1: Little Goat Diner////The food we ordered was sublime.  I had the Kimchee & Bacon & Eggs & Pancakes
column2: aka the Asian Style Breakfast Tasty Thing.  Hubby had the Bull's Eye French Toast
column3: with a side of the home fries.  There were so many layers of flavor going on
column4: complex but delicious and with a clear purpose.  For sure
column5: it's the best breakfast food I've ever eaten in my life
column6: and it ranks right up the with the best meals I've ever had as well.
